bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shi zhi 食滯 , food stagnation. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry xing 杏 quotes Yang shi jia cang fang 楊氏家藏方 : 一切食停，氣滿膨脹 , 用紅杏仁三百粒，巴豆二十粒同炒，色變去豆 不用，研杏為末，橘皮湯調下 ”In all cases of food halt with qi fullness, swelling and distension, take 200 red pieces of xing ren and 20 pieces of ba dou , to be roasted together. When the color changes, discard the [ ba ] dou , they must not be used. Grind the xing [ ren ] to a powder, and ingest mixed with a ju pi decoction”.
